      static TernaryPolynomial Util.generateRandomTernary(int N, int numOnes, int numNegOnes, boolean sparse, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Generates a "sparse" or "dense" polynomial containing numOnes ints equal to 1, numNegOnes int equal to -1, and the rest equal to 0.
